AchievementResetAllResponse.name: AchievementResetAllResponse
AchievementResetAllResponse.description: This is a JSON template for achievement reset all response.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#achievementResetAllResponse.

AchievementResetMultipleForAllRequest.name: AchievementResetMultipleForAllRequest
AchievementResetMultipleForAllRequest.description: This is a JSON template for multiple achievements reset all request.

achievement_ids.name: achievement_ids
achievement_ids.description: The IDs of achievements to reset.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#achievementResetMultipleForAllRequest.

AchievementResetResponse.name: AchievementResetResponse
AchievementResetResponse.description: This is a JSON template for an achievement reset response.

updateOccurred.name: updateOccurred
updateOccurred.description: Flag to indicate if the requested update actually occurred.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#achievementResetResponse.

currentState.name: currentState
currentState.description:
The current state of the achievement. This is the same as the initial state of the achievement.
Possible values are:  
- "HIDDEN"- Achievement is hidden. 
- "REVEALED" - Achievement is revealed. 
- "UNLOCKED" - Achievement is unlocked.

definitionId.name: definitionId
definitionId.description: The ID of an achievement for which player state has been updated.

EventsResetMultipleForAllRequest.name: EventsResetMultipleForAllRequest
EventsResetMultipleForAllRequest.description: This is a JSON template for multiple events reset all request.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#eventsResetMultipleForAllRequest.

event_ids.name: event_ids
event_ids.description: The IDs of events to reset.

GamesPlayedResource.name: GamesPlayedResource
GamesPlayedResource.description: This is a JSON template for metadata about a player playing a game with the currently authenticated user.

autoMatched.name: autoMatched
autoMatched.description: True if the player was auto-matched with the currently authenticated user.

timeMillis.name: timeMillis
timeMillis.description: The last time the player played the game in milliseconds since the epoch in UTC.

GamesPlayerExperienceInfoResource.name: GamesPlayerExperienceInfoResource
GamesPlayerExperienceInfoResource.description: This is a JSON template for 1P/3P metadata about the player's experience.

currentExperiencePoints.name: currentExperiencePoints
currentExperiencePoints.description: The current number of experience points for the player.

lastLevelUpTimestampMillis.name: lastLevelUpTimestampMillis
lastLevelUpTimestampMillis.description: The timestamp when the player was leveled up, in millis since Unix epoch UTC.

GamesPlayerLevelResource.name: GamesPlayerLevelResource
GamesPlayerLevelResource.description: This is a JSON template for 1P/3P metadata about a user's level.

minExperiencePoints.name: minExperiencePoints
minExperiencePoints.description: The minimum experience points for this level.

maxExperiencePoints.name: maxExperiencePoints
maxExperiencePoints.description: The maximum experience points for this level.

HiddenPlayer.name: HiddenPlayer
HiddenPlayer.description: This is a JSON template for the HiddenPlayer resource.

hiddenTimeMillis.name: hiddenTimeMillis
hiddenTimeMillis.description: The time this player was hidden.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#hiddenPlayer.

HiddenPlayerList.name: HiddenPlayerList
HiddenPlayerList.description: This is a JSON template for a list of hidden players.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#hiddenPlayerList.

nextPageToken.name: nextPageToken
nextPageToken.description: The pagination token for the next page of results.

Player.name: Player
Player.description: This is a JSON template for a Player resource.

bannerUrlLandscape.name: bannerUrlLandscape
bannerUrlLandscape.description: The url to the landscape mode player banner image.

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The name to display for the player.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#player.

avatarImageUrl.name: avatarImageUrl
avatarImageUrl.description: The base URL for the image that represents the player.

name.name: name
name.description: An object representation of the individual components of the player's name. For some players, these fields may not be present.

familyName.name: familyName
familyName.description: The family name of this player. In some places, this is known as the last name.

givenName.name: givenName
givenName.description: The given name of this player. In some places, this is known as the first name.

originalPlayerId.name: originalPlayerId
originalPlayerId.description: The player ID that was used for this player the first time they signed into the game in question. This is only populated for calls to player.get for the requesting player, only if the player ID has subsequently changed, and only to clients that support remapping player IDs.

bannerUrlPortrait.name: bannerUrlPortrait
bannerUrlPortrait.description: The url to the portrait mode player banner image.

title.name: title
title.description: The player's title rewarded for their game activities.

PlayerScoreResetAllResponse.name: PlayerScoreResetAllResponse
PlayerScoreResetAllResponse.description: This is a JSON template for a list of leaderboard reset resources.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#playerScoreResetResponse.

PlayerScoreResetResponse.name: PlayerScoreResetResponse
PlayerScoreResetResponse.description: This is a JSON template for a list of reset leaderboard entry resources.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#playerScoreResetResponse.

resetScoreTimeSpans.name: resetScoreTimeSpans
resetScoreTimeSpans.description:
The time spans of the updated score.
Possible values are:  
- "ALL_TIME" - The score is an all-time score. 
- "WEEKLY" - The score is a weekly score. 
- "DAILY" - The score is a daily score.

definitionId.name: definitionId
definitionId.description: The ID of an leaderboard for which player state has been updated.

ProfileSettings.name: ProfileSettings
ProfileSettings.description: This is a JSON template for profile settings

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#profileSettings.

profileVisible.name: profileVisible
profileVisible.description: The player's current profile visibility. This field is visible to both 1P and 3P APIs.

QuestsResetMultipleForAllRequest.name: QuestsResetMultipleForAllRequest
QuestsResetMultipleForAllRequest.description: This is a JSON template for multiple quests reset all request.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#questsResetMultipleForAllRequest.

quest_ids.name: quest_ids
quest_ids.description: The IDs of quests to reset.

ScoresResetMultipleForAllRequest.name: ScoresResetMultipleForAllRequest
ScoresResetMultipleForAllRequest.description: This is a JSON template for multiple scores reset all request.

leaderboard_ids.name: leaderboard_ids
leaderboard_ids.description: The IDs of leaderboards to reset.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#scoresResetMultipleForAllRequest.

quotaUser.name: quotaUser
quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint
prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

userIp.name: userIp
userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

structuredValue: Share your Google+ profile information and view and manage your game activity
Know the list of people in your circles, your age range, and language
commons.OathScopeDescriptions.name: commons.OathScopeDescriptions

oath2.name: oath2
oath2.description: Google Oath2.0 authorization. Detailed documentation can be found at https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2

title: Google Play Game Services Management API

methods.description: Reset all rooms for the currently authenticated player for your application. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Deletes rooms where the only room participants are from whitelisted tester accounts for your application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Reset all turn-based match data for a user. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Deletes turn-based matches where the only match participants are from whitelisted tester accounts for your application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Resets achievements with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft achievements may be reset.

achievementId.name: achievementId
achievementId.description: The ID of the achievement used by this method.

methods.description: Resets the achievement with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Resets the achievement with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft achievements can be reset.
Resets all draft achievements for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Resets all achievements for the currently authenticated player for your application. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Resets quests with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft quests may be reset.
Resets all player progress on the quest with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Resets all player progress on the quest with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft quests can be reset.
Resets all draft quests for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Resets all player progress on all quests for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Resets scores for the leaderboards with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft leaderboards may be reset.
Resets scores for all draft leaderboards for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Resets all scores for all leaderboards for the currently authenticated players. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Resets scores for the leaderboard with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.
Resets scores for the leaderboard with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft leaderboards can be reset.

applicationId.name: applicationId
applicationId.description: The application ID from the Google Play developer console.

maxResults.name: maxResults
maxResults.description: The maximum number of player resources to return in the response, used for paging. For any response, the actual number of player resources returned may be less than the specified maxResults.

pageToken.name: pageToken
pageToken.description: The token returned by the previous request.

methods.description: Get the list of players hidden from the given application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Hide the given player's leaderboard scores from the given application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.
Unhide the given player's leaderboard scores from the given application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

playerId.name: playerId
playerId.description: A player ID. A value of me may be used in place of the authenticated player's ID.

methods.description: Resets events with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft events may be reset. All quests that use any of the events will also be reset.

Resets all player progress on the event with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application. All quests for this player that use the event will also be reset.

Resets the event with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft events can be reset. All quests that use the event will also be reset.
Resets all draft events for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. All quests that use any of these events will also be reset.

Resets all player progress on all events for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application. All quests for this player will also be reset.
